DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study prospectively compare post-operative pain relief pediatric patient undergo traumatic femur fracture repair receive either femoral nerve block lateral femoral cutaneous nerve block standard anesthetic analgesia .
DOC.brief_title: Femoral Nerve Block Femur Fracture Repair Pediatrics
DOC.criteria: ASA physical status I II Weight great equal 10kg Presenting repair traumatic femur fracture ASA physical status > II Comorbid disease ( cardiac , pulmonary , neurological disease ) Patients concomitant procedure Abnormal neurovascular examination injure leg Presence vascular compromise affect low extremity Mechanism sustain injury via crush injury Use therapeutic dose anticoagulant presence bleeding disorder
